errors.message: Missing glass morphism - ALL cards must have backdrop-blur
errors.suggestion: Add: backdrop-filter: blur(20px) and -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(20px) or use className="pm33-glass-card"

errors.message: Missing gradient text - ALL headlines must use gradient styling
errors.suggestion: Add: className="text-gradient" or background: linear-gradient(...)

errors.message: Insufficient shadow depth - Use professional shadows, never flat
errors.suggestion: Replace shadow-sm with shadow-glass or shadow-premium

errors.message: Hardcoded design values forbidden - Use design tokens
errors.suggestion: Use CSS custom properties: var(--pm33-spacing-md), var(--pm33-text-lg), var(--pm33-radius-md)

errors.message: Forbidden font family: serif
errors.suggestion: Use approved fonts: Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Roboto

errors.message: Toggle element missing dark/light theme support
errors.suggestion: Add dark: classes and theme-conditional styling (e.g., dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-white)

errors.message: Button not using PM33 brand colors
errors.suggestion: Use gradient: bg-gradient-to-r from-[#667eea] to-[#764ba2] or solid: bg-[#10b981]

errors.message: Button missing hover states
errors.suggestion: Add hover:scale-105 transition-transform or hover:opacity-90

errors.suggestion: Add bg-white/95 backdrop-blur-lg dark:bg-gray-900/95 for glass effect

errors.suggestion: Add dark: variants for all colors and backgrounds
